topic.title: Need for an opinion
topic.body:
Hi, you could tell me how you find this configuration of the interface I tinkered with in HTML/CSS on my ZeroBlog

http://127.0.0.1:43110/19Qyvvo4bwMy5jNBHzVh8CCvHRWCrP7DFt/

1546355347_15qjmvt2VQwHuLU6mLM5P7EXopGD6.body: I leave Zeronet on... So I moved the whole left part on the top of the page to leave free space for the articles
I'll fix this problem later, thank you very much. I'll post a comment when I do.
